body: I found out about McZone (the old Avicus) through a friend. How did you find out about Avicus?
body_tagged: I found out about McZone (the old Avicus) through a friend. How did you find out about Avicus?
title: How did you find out about Avicus?

replies.body: Searched for "Skywars servers" and found the McZone IP, but it was already Avicus :3
replies.body_tagged: Searched for "Skywars servers" and found the McZone IP, but it was already Avicus :3

replies.body: This has been talked about before, but its been a while. I found out via minecraftserverslist.com I went to like page 8 of the list and found MCZone so i decided it looked fun. I've been hooked ever since!! :)
replies.body_tagged: This has been talked about before, but its been a while. I found out via minecraftserverslist.com I went to like page 8 of the list and found MCZone so i decided it looked fun. I've been hooked ever since!! :)

replies.body: My sister iT was the first server that i joined
replies.body_tagged: My sister iT was the first server that i joined

replies.body: A friend from grade 5 told me about MCZone, and I'm playing it ever since then :)

I played on it from time to time on MCZone, but not for very long.

replies.body:
Americangirl please stop creating spam type threads and remember to look before creating similar ones. (http://avicus.net/forums/bb7dcdcf9) 
Its very annoying and clogs up the forums. 
Thanks
